SDG_GOAL: Goal 16: Promote peaceful and inclusive societies for sustainable development, provide access to justice for all and build effective, accountable and inclusive institutions at all levels
SDG_TARGET: Target 16.7: Ensure responsive, inclusive, participatory and representative decision-making at all levels
SDG_INDICATOR: Indicator 16.7.2: Proportion of population who believe decision-making is inclusive and responsive, by sex, age, disability and population group
STAT_CONC_DEF: This survey-based indicator measures self-reported levels of 'external political efficacy', that is, the extent to which people think that politicians and/or political institutions will listen to, and act on, the opinions of ordinary citizens
